sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均有"自由"之意。
means: freedom ： 含义广，指任何无限制无束缚的自由自在状态。
liberty ： 常可与freedom换用，但强调从过去受的压制、管束下被解救或释放出来，也指法律所承认的特权，如言论、集会等自由。

encyclopedia.content: "自由" 这是Akon最新个人专辑的名称，源于他对纽约Fishkill露天演唱会上行为的“忏悔”；源于他对特立尼达岛Zen俱乐部中行为的“忏悔”；源于对祖国国旗上那个象征着争取独立自由而斗争的烈士鲜血的敬意；也源于他自己的梦想：洗脱原罪与本罪，真正卸下身上“罪”的烙印。

entry.def: Freedom is the state of being allowed to do what you want to do. Freedoms are instances of this.

example.tran: 他们想要更多的政治自由。

entry.def: When prisoners or slaves are set free or escape, they gain their freedom .

example.ex: ...the agreement worked out by the UN, under which all hostages and detainees would gain their freedom.
example.tran: 联合国拟定的恢复所有人质和被拘禁者人身自由的协议

entry.tran: 摆脱;免除;不受…影响的状态
entry.def: Freedom from something you do not want means not being affected by it.

example.ex: ...all the freedom from pain that medicine could provide.
example.tran: 医药可以提供的对痛苦的解脱

entry.def: The freedom of a particular city is a special honour which is given to a famous person who is connected with that city, or to someone who has performed some special service for the city.

example.ex: He was given the Freedom of the City of Dublin by the Lord Mayor.
example.tran: 市长阁下亲自向他颁发了都柏林市荣誉市民称号。

means.word_mean: 1. the condition of being free; the power to act or speak or think without externally imposed restraints
2. immunity from an obligation or duty

auth_sentence.content: Press freedom, like all liberties, is indivisible.
auth_sentence.res_content: Press freedom, like all liberties, is indivisible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Press freedom, like all liberties, is indivisible.

auth_sentence.content: But there was much more freedom to take risks.
auth_sentence.res_content: But there was much more freedom to take risks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But there was much more freedom to take risks.

auth_sentence.content: But this freedom is not without its' downside.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this freedom is not without its' downside.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this freedom is not without its' downside.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,多加在形容词后,表示"状态或领域"

stems_affixes.word_buile: film电影+dom状态或领域→n.电影界,电影业
free自由+dom状态或领域→n.自由,自主,免除,特权
king国王+dom状态或领域→n.王国,领域
wise智慧的+dom状态或领域→wisdom智慧,明智

Sentence.sentence: Her main reason for returning to academia mid-career was to take advantage of the greater freedom to choose research questions.
Most mothers do not aspire to (向往) elite,competitive full-time positions: the Swedish policies have given them the freedom and opportunity to live the lives they prefer.
Swedish women are allowed the freedom and opportunity to choose their own way of life
Sweden has gone farther than any other nation on earth to integrate the sexes and to offer women the same opportunities and freedoms as men.

means.word_mean: （指权利或状态）自由自在, 自主

sentences.en: He has been granted his freedom on condition that he leaves the country.
sentences.cn: 他已获准恢复自由, 条件是他离开这个国家。

means.word_mean: 自由权,自由民地位（不是囚犯或奴隶）

sentences.en: She's old enough to have the freedom to do as she likes.
sentences.cn: 她已成年了, 有权做她喜欢做的事。

jushi.english: They enjoyed their fill of happiness and freedom for the first time.
jushi.chinese: 他们第一次饱尝着自由和幸福。

jushi.english: They fought to defend their freedom.
Chinese citizens enjoy the freedom to believe in religion and the freedom not to believe in it and to propagate atheism.
jushi.chinese: 中国公民有信仰宗教的自由和不信仰宗教、宣传无神论的自由。
